alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 29 at 6:30PM CDT until October 29 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MOBILE COUNTY... At 630 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located over Theodore, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Tillmans Corner around 635 PM CDT. I10 And I65 around 640 PM CDT. Midtown Mobile and Mobile Regional Airport around 645 PM CDT. Downtown Mobile around 650 PM CDT. Prichard, Chickasaw, Semmes and I65 And I165 around 655 PM CDT. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
